```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE)
```

```{r, warning = F, include=F}
library(SixSigma)
```


```{r, echo= F }
effect <- "Abnormal Peak"
causes.gr <- c("Method Settings", "Mass Spec","LC-Column", "LC-Plumbing")
causes <- vector(mode = "list", length = length(causes.gr))
causes[1] <- list(c("---Dwell time", "---Interscan delay"))
causes[2] <- list(c("---Ion supression"))
causes[3] <- list(c("---Aged guard column"))
causes[4] <- list(c("---Fitting", "---Inappropriate ferrule", "---Worn ferrule"))

ss.ceDiag(effect, causes.gr, causes, main =("Cause and Effect Diagram \n - Abnormal Peak"), sub = "",
          ss.col = c("#8ad472", "#8ad472", "#8ad472", "#8ad472","#8ad472"))
```
